quests.desc: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! First step, try to venture east. Following that, move east. After that, make an attempt to go to the south. After that, make an attempt to take a trip east. After that, attempt to take a trip north. And then, retrieve the formless key from the floor of the bathroom. Having got the formless key, make it so that the formless safe is unlocked with the formless key. Then, make sure that the formless safe is opened. If you have pulled open the formless safe, retrieve the vacuum from the formless safe in the bathroom. And then, put the vacuum inside the cabinet. And if you do that, you're the winner!
commands: unlock formless safe with formless key
unlock formless safe with formless key

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You arrive in a bathroom. A normal kind of place.

 If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a cabinet![if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a formless safe.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The formless safe contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The formless safe is empty![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

Hm. Oh well[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

walkthrough: unlock formless safe with formless key

objective: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is your task for today. Your first objective is to move east. Then, move east. And then, go to the south. Once you manage that, travel east. That done, attempt to go to the north. Then, pick up the formless key from the floor of the bathroom. And then, unlock the formless safe in the bathroom with the formless key. And then, ensure that the formless safe in the bathroom is open. After opening the formless safe, take the vacuum from the formless safe in the bathroom. Then, place the vacuum inside the cabinet. Got that? Good!
